title: Sobs of top footballer’s ex ‘who dumped child in hot car to visit casino’
text:
Sintia Pinagrote sobbed for her mugshot after allegedly being caught dumping her seven year-old daughter in a car to enjoy the new Hard Rock Hotel in Hollywood, Florida (Pictures: Broward County Sheriff’s Office/AP)

A famous footballer’s girlfriend sobbed for her mugshot after allegedly leaving her seven year-old daughter in a hot car to visit a casino.

Sintia Pinagrote’s eyes appeared red and swollen after was arrested at the new Hard Rock Hotel in Hollywood, California on Sunday.

Pinagrote, 31, claims she only ran into the casino for a few minutes to pick him up.

But surveillance cameras are said to show the pair arriving together around midnight.

The couple, who are originally from Eduador, had been visiting the US for a vacation which also saw them take in Walt Disney World in Orlando, as well as a cruise.

Their daughter was seen in the car alone around 12:30am, with police saying she spent at least an hour in the vehicle unattended.

She did not come to any physical harm.

A spokesman for Seminole Police Department told NBC6: ‘Seminole Police and Casino Security officers follow a zero tolerance policy for children left alone in vehicles at Seminole Casinos.’

The new Hard Rock Hotel opened earlier this month, with its unique guitar-shaped tower making headlines around the world.

A lavish opening ceremony was attended by stars including Johnny Depp and Khloe Kardashian.

Pinagrote and Valencia have both been charged with felony abuse of a child without great bodily harm.

They have been released on $5,000 bond, with the youngster now in the care of social services.

Her parents, who appeared in court Monday, have been barred from contacting her, WPLG reported.
